content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help you get scheduled. May I please have your name to get started?
Uh, hi, it’s Margaret… I think I need help with something dripping under the kitchen sink.
Thank you, Margaret! I can help with kitchen sink plumbing issues. Can you please provide your address so I can confirm you’re in our service area?
It’s 44 Oakwood Drive… um, I think that’s enough? Do you need my zip? I don’t really know how this works.
Thank you, Margaret! 44 Oakwood Drive is perfect. Can I get your zip code, just to make sure you’re fully covered by our team?
Oh, it’s 90220. Will this be expensive? I’m just worried.

Thank you, that helps! We always try to keep costs as low as possible. Small plumbing leaks under the kitchen sink are usually quick to assess. Would you like a free estimate before any work begins? Also, is there a particular time that’s best for you to have someone come take a look?
A free estimate? That’s good, I just… mornings are best, but not too early, please. Is there a fee for someone to show up?
No fee for showing up, Margaret! Estimates are free and you’ll only pay if you decide to have the work done. For a morning, would between 9 AM and 11 AM work for you?
Yes, between 9 and 11 is perfect. But they’ll call before coming, right? I get nervous sometimes.
Absolutely, our plumber will give you a call before they arrive. I’ll schedule your appointment for tomorrow between 9 and 11 AM. One moment while I confirm availability.
You’re all set, Margaret! We’ll see you tomorrow between 9 and 11 AM at 44 Oakwood Drive. The plumber will call beforehand. Let us know if you have any other questions—otherwise, you’re good to go!
reason: Appointment scheduled for plumbing issue under kitchen sink.
